dsOverview.title: VonderHaar's Nimbus-3 Minimum Albedo Analyses, 1969Apr-1970Feb

summary.p: This dataset contains global analyses of minimum albedo values over several periods between April 1969 and February 1970 from the Nimbus-3 satellite.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: COLOSTATE/ATMOS > Department of Atmospheric Science, Colorado State University

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Land Surface > Surface Radiative Properties > Albedo
EARTH SCIENCE > Spectral/Engineering > Visible Wavelengths > Visible Imagery

reference.authorList: Raschke, E., T.H. Vonder Haar, M. Pasternack, and W.R. Bandeen
reference.title: The Radiation Balance of the Earth Atmosphere System from Nimbus-3 Radiation Measurements
